title: Feed n' Leave
body:
Anyone else like to feed and leave ranked games? This is my favorite way to blow off some steam. Or if I'm angry and feeling spiteful Riot has pretty much offered the perfect platform for people like me.

I join a ranked game and immediately in Champion Select I make sure they all know I'm going to feed and troll them. This gets them riled up big time. The best part is though, that they can't leave! Yep, Riot has all these nice systems in place that actually force people to get trolled and grieved or else suffer penalties like LP loss or leaverbuster. It's perfect!

Enough about that though. When the game starts I buy some boots and just feed each lane and their jungler once. Then I'll go to whichever lane I choose and soak EXP and feed some more. By this time my team is REALLY upset. Sometimes they even leave when they don't want to sit through my trolling for 20-40 minutes but that's okay, I'm sure they'll think of me when they queue up again and get a nice low priority queue. One of the funniest things that happens is sometimes they will get so upset, and since I'm not saying anything in chat (to avoid getting any sort of punishment by Riot's great automated system) they actually turn on EACH OTHER. And by the end of the game they are all reporting each other. And me of course but I have never been punished because I don't say mean things in chat that trigger their automated system. 

So I just wanted to thank you Riot and Lyte. You are a troll's greatest ally. Forcing people to suffer my wrath or face punishment and smiting those who express their frustration when I've pushed their nerves to the limits.

replies.body: No I'm legit serious. On my level 30 account I do this in ranked Bronze 5 games. I'm not mad either. Actually I'm pretty happy atm because I just ruined the game for about 20 people and probably got a handful of them chat restrictions and leaverbuster penalties.

upvoted. love your post OP and, as a disco nunu main, i intend on doing the same thing.
I love when the whole game erupts into {{champion:48}} {{summoner:14}} usually if there is a white knight on my team i will single them out and ask the enemy team report them for my false accusations, claiming they were trash talking me for being new. i will also ask the enemy team to honor me after match to help counterbalance the reports, which i have found to be a reliable source of honor, i am working on my honor ribbon currently, best of luck and...

i'll see you in ranked! {{champion:48}} 

"It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of feeding, it was the age of leaving."
